tool_description:
Collection management software for museums and heritage organisations
An end-to-end collection management application, Vesica can help museums and heritage organisations document, manage, preserve and monetize collections. Using Vesica is easy and can lead to substantial financial savings.
name: Vesica
title: Vesica

api_list.name: Pieces
api_list.description: to see a summary all the pieces in your account (default 25, maximum 100 at a time).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://community-vesica.p.rapidapi.com/pieces"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-vesica.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Collection
api_list.description: a summary of the pieces in a specific collection

api_list.name: Collections
api_list.description: to see all the collections in your account and a summary of pieces in those collections.
